name: Just a Test Thing, Run Away
name_original: Just a Test Thing, Run Away
description:
This is the first thing I've attempted to make in RPG maker.

That lil character sprite was done by me, all the other stuff is painfully default RPG Maker MV stuff.

Play time's about like.... 1 minute. 

I'll be making my own ACTUAL game starting the day after this is uploaded.

Like... with custom stuff.
